link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd

generic:link.msg:message: "Total Level 1 Assets" = (Cash in hand + Excess CRR balance + Government Securities in excess of minimum SLR requirement + Government securities within the mandatory SLR requirement, to the extent allowed by RBI under MSF + Marketable securities issued or guaranteed by foreign sovereigns having 0% risk-weight under Basel II Standardised Approach + Facility to Avail Liquidity for Liquidity Coverage Ratio)

"Total Adjusted Level 1 Assets" = (Total Level 1 Assets + Add amount lent under a reverse repo transaction undertaken for up to and including 30 days in repo-eligible non-Level 1 assets + Deduct amount borrowed under a repo transaction undertaken for up to and including 30 days in repo-eligible non-Level 1 assets)

"Total Level 2A Assets" = (Marketable securities representing claims on or claims guaranteed by sovereigns, Public Sector Entities (PSEs) or multilateral development banks that are assigned a 20% risk weight under the Basel II Standardised Approach for credit risk and provided that they are not issued by a bank/financial institution/NBFC or any of its affiliated entities. + Corporate bonds, not issued by a bank/financial institution/NBFC or any of its affiliated entities, which have been rated AA- or above by an Eligible Credit Rating Agency + Commercial Papers not issued by a bank/ PD/financial institution or any of its affiliated entities, which have a short-term rating equivalent to the long-term rating of AA- or above by an Eligible Credit Rating Agency)

"Total Adjusted Level 2A Assets" = (Total Level 2A Assets + Add market value of repo-eligible Level 2A securities placed as collateral under a repo transaction undertaken for up to (and including) 30 days + Deduct market value of repo-eligible Level 2A securities acquired as collateral under a reverse repo transaction undertaken for up to (and including) 30 days)

"Total Level 2B Assets" = (Marketable securities representing claims on or claims guaranteed by sovereigns having risk weights higher than 20% but not higher than 50% + Common Equity Shares not issued by a bank/financial institution/NBFC or any of its affiliated entities and included in NSE CNX Nifty and/or S&P BSE Sensex indices + Corporate debt securities (including commercial paper))

"Total Adjusted Level 2B Assets" = (Total Level 2B Assets + Add market value of repo-eligible Level 2B securities placed as collateral under a repo transaction undertaken for upto (and including) 30 days + Deduct market value of repo-eligible Level 2B securities accquired as collateral under a reverse repo transaction undertaken for upto (and including) 30 days)
"Weighted Amount" = (Unweighted Amount * Factor to be Multiplied)
"Consolidated Total Stock of HQLAs" = (sum of (Total Stock of HQLAs + Adjustment in HQLA to reflect liquidity transfer restrictions))
"Retail Deposits" = (Stable Deposits + less Stable Desposit)

"Unsecured wholesale funding" = (Demand and term deposits + Operational deposits generated by clearing, custody and cash management activities + Non-financial corporate, sovereigns, central banks, multilateral development banks, and PSEs + Funding from other legal entity customers)
"Demand and term deposits" = (Stable deposits + Less stable deposits)
Operational deposits generated by clearing, custody and cash management activities should be equal to sum of (portion covered by deposit insurance + portion not covered by deposit insurance)

"Secured Funding" = (Secured funding transaction with RBI/central bank or backed by Level 1 assets with any counterparty + Backed by Level 2A assets with any counterparty + Backed by Level 2B assets with any counterparty + Any other secured funding)

"Additional requirements" = (Sum of (Net derivative cash outflows + Liquidity needs (e.g. collateral calls) related to financing transactions, derivatives and other contracts where 'downgrade triggers' up to and including a 3-notch downgrade + Market valuation changes on derivatives transactions (largest absolute net 30-day collateral flows realised during the preceding 24 months) based on look back approach + Increased liquidity needs related to the potential for valuation changes on non-Level 1 posted collateral securing derivatives + Increased liquidity needs related to excess non-segregated collateral held by the bank that could contractually be called at any time by the counterparty + Increased liquidity needs related to contractually required collateral on transactions for which the counterparty has not yet demanded the collateral be posted + Increased liquidity needs related to derivative transactions that allow collateral substitution to non-HQLA assets + ABCP, SIVs, SPVs etc. maturing within the 30 days period + Currently undrawn committed credit and liquidity facilities[2] provided to + Other contingent funding liabilities + Any other contractual outflows not captured elsewhere in this template))
"ABCP, SIVs, SPVs etc. maturing within the 30 days period" = (Sum of (liabilities from maturing ABCP, SIVs, SPVs, etc. + asset Backed Securities applied to maturing amounts))

"Currently undrawn committed credit and liquidity facilities" = Sum of (retail and small business clients + non-financial corporates, sovereigns and central banks, multilateral development banks, and PSEs - Credit facilities + non-financial corporates, sovereigns and central banks, multilateral development banks, and PSEs - Liquidity facilities + banks + other financial institutions (including securities firms, insurance companies) - Credit facilities + other financial institutions (including securities firms, insurance companies) - Liquidity facilities + other legal entity customers))
"Other contingent funding liabilities" = (Guarantees, Letters of credit and Trade Finance + Revocable credit and liquidity facilities + Any other)
"Total Cash Outflows" = (Retail Deposits + Unsecured wholesale funding + Secured Funding + Additional requirements)
"Maturing secured lending transactions backed by the following collaterals" = (With Level 1 assets + With Level 2A assets + With Level 2B assets)

"Other inflows by counterparty" = (Retail and small business counterparties + Amounts to be received from non-financial wholesale counterparties, from transactions other than those listed in above inflow categories + Amounts to be received from financial institutions and RBI/central banks, from transactions other than those listed in above inflow categories)

"Total Cash Inflows" = (Maturing secured lending transactions backed by the following collaterals + Margin Lending backed by all other collateral + All other assets + Lines of credit - Credit or liquidity facilities or other contingent funding facilities that the bank holds at other institutions for its own purpose + Other inflows by counterparty + Net derivatives cash inflows + Other contractual cash inflows)
(Total Cash Outflows - Total Cash Inflows(Unweighted Amount)) = (Total Cash Outflows(Unweighted Amount) - Total Cash Inflows (Unweighted Amount))
(Total Cash Outflows - Total Cash Inflows(Weighted Amount)) = (Total Cash Outflows(Weighted Amount) - Total Cash Inflows (Weighted Amount))
"25% of Total Cash outflows(Unweighted Amount)" = (Cash Outflow (Unweighted Amount) * 0.25).
"25% of Total Cash outflows(Weighted Amount)" = (Cash Outflow (Weighted Amount) * 0.25)
"Total Net Cash Outflows(Unweighted Amount)" = Higher of (Total Cash Outflows less Total Cash Inflows(Unweighted Amount) or 25% of Total Cash outflows (Unweighted Amount))
"Total Net Cash Outflows(Weighted Amount)" = Higher of (Total Cash Outflows less Total Cash Inflows(Weighted Amount) or 25% of Total Cash outflows (Weighted Amount))
"Liquidity Coverage Ratio" = (Consolidated Total Stock of High Quality Liquid Assets (Item 26 in Panel I)*100/Total Net Cash Outflows (Item G in Panel 2))

"Sum of investment in securitites (country wise)" = "Marketable securities issued or guaranteed by foreign sovereigns having 0% risk-weight under Basel II Standardised Approach (country-wise details to be provided under memo item no.1) (Unweighted Amount)"
"Total of Foreign Sovereigns" should be equal to sum of "Foreign Sovereigns"
"Total of PSEs" should be equal to sum of "Public Sector Entities"
"Total of MDBs, BIS, IMF" = (Sum of MDBs, BIS, IMF)

"Marketable securities representing claims on or claims guaranteed by sovereigns, Public Sector Entities (PSEs) or multilateral development banks that are assigned a 20% risk weight under the Basel II Standardised Approach for credit risk and provided that they are not issued by a bank/financial institution/NBFC or any of its affiliated entities. (issuer-wise details to be provided under memo item no.2) (Unweighted Amount)" = (Total of Foreign Sovereigns + Total of PSEs + Total of MDBs, etc)
"Total of Memo 3" = Sum of "values of all subsidiaries".
"Weighted Amount" = (Unweighted Amount * Run-off Factors)
"Weighted Amount" = (Unweighted Amount * Run-off Factors)
Total Stock of High Quality Liquid Assets (Item 24 in Panel I)*100/Total Net Cash Outflows (Item G in Panel 2)
"Total Stock of HQLAs" = (Level 1 (Unadjusted) + Level 2A(Unadjusted) + Level 2B(Unadjusted) - Adjustment for 15% cap - Adjustment for 40% cap)
"Weighted Amount" = (Unweighted Amount * Run-off Factors)
